coreAtributes.name: Leather Muzzle
coreAtributes.description: A contraption of sturdy leather with belts to fixate it on the wearer's head. It is commonly used to prevent pets from biting people, eating junk or otherwise misuse their mouthes.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unbuckle the belts and put the muzzle off your face. It's nice to be abe to use you mouth again.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unbuckle the belts and put the muzzle off [npc.name]'s face.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name] by the nap of [npc.her] neck and unbuckle the muzzle's belts. With a rough jerk, you pull the item off.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] unbuckles the belts and puts the muzzle off [npc.her] face.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] unbuckles the belts and puts the muzzle off your face.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] grabs you by the nap of your neck and neck and unbuckles the muzzle's belts. With a rough jerk, [npc.she] pulls the item off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] unbuckles the belts and puts the muzzle off [npc2.name]'s face.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] grabs [npc2.name] by the nap of [npc2.her] neck and unbuckles the muzzle's belts. With a rough jerk, [npc.she] pulls the item off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put the muzzle on your face and fasten the belts on the back of your head.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the muzzle on [npc.name]'s face and fasten the belts.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name] by the nap of [npc.her] neck and shove the muzzle of [npc.her] face. You fasten the belts, pulling them a hole or two too tight.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] puts the muzzle on your face and fasten the belts on the back of [npc.her] head.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] puts the muzzle on your face and fastets the belts.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] grabs you by the nap of your neck and shoves the muzzle on your face. You feel the think is getting fasten tight - too tight.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] puts the muzzle on [npc2.name]'s face and fastens the belts.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] puts the muzzle on [npc2.name]'s face, treating [npc2.her] like a bad dog.
